block.p: Geraldine Bucci and Kevin Christopher Keating were married Friday at the Roman Catholic Church of St. Jude in Monroe, Conn. The Rev. Joseph Karcsinski performed the ceremony.

Mrs. Keating, a graduate of Sacred Heart University, is the manager of research support at the Optima Group, a financial consulting firm in Fairfield, Conn. She is a daughter of Gail and Andrew Bucci of Monroe.
Geraldine Bucci and Kevin Christopher Keating were married Friday at the Roman Catholic Church of St. Jude in Monroe, Conn. The Rev. Joseph Karcsinski performed the ceremony.

Mrs. Keating, a graduate of Sacred Heart University, is the manager of research support at the Optima Group, a financial consulting firm in Fairfield, Conn. She is a daughter of Gail and Andrew Bucci of Monroe.

Mr. Keating graduated from Western Connecticut State University. He is a senior vice president of O'Keefe Associates, executive search consultants in Fairfield, and the managing director of the company's electronic commerce division. He is a son of the late Gloria and Edward Keating.
The bride and bridegroom work in the same building in Fairfield and met in an elevator there.
